item.description:
Come see the remake of the classic Clash of the Titan at the Boston Common Theater. The New Clash of the Titan movie follows the mortal son of the god Zeus embarks on a perilous journey to stop the underworld and its minions from spreading their evil to Earth as well as the heavens.

Staring: Sam Worthington, Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes, Danny Huston, Gemma Arterton, Mads Mikkelsen, Jason Flemyng, Alexa Davalos, Izabella Miko, Nicholas Hoult, Pete Postlethwait.

Avi will be waiting out front of the theater around 1:30 and going in to get seats around 2:00.
item.name: Clash of the Titans Matinee
